about_the_game:
Prepare for the ultimate horror multiplayer experience:
Horror Royale is an online and local multiplayer co-op/PvP survival horror game. Communicate with your friends using proximity chat (but try not to be so loud that the monsters can hear) and use items and your environment to avoid the monsters and survive.

Game Modes:


Oddball
An oddball will spawn on the map, try to find it first or steal it from other players, hold on to it to get enough points to escape and leave everyone else behind.

Tag
In tag, a player will start ‘in’ and it is their goal to pass it on to someone else. In this game mode the monsters can only see the player that is ‘in’. In order to survive you have to be the last player standing. Game modifier: Build Up Tag - This modifier means that you will stay ‘in’ after you tag someone else.

Survive The Night
Work with your friends to survive until 6AM.

PvP
In PvP, your goal is to be the last player standing, ways to get this done include luring the monster to other players using noisemakers and blinding them with flashbangs.

Objectives
Complete objectives scattered randomly throughout the map, all while avoiding the monster, to survive this game mode.

Maps:

  • House
  • Abode
  • Double Story
  • Tower
  • Space Station
  • Abandoned
  • Forest
  • Level 426

Multiplayer:

Four player split screen and private matches (including LAN) are available to play with friends. You can also host a public game or find a game through quick match or server browser allowing you to play with other people online.

Game Modifiers:

The host will be able to choose a wide variety of different options that can change the game drastically. These options include but are not limited to:
  • Difficulty
  • Number of monsters
  • Types of monsters (Eight different types of monsters that can be toggled on or off)
  • Fire
  • Human AI
  • Up Close and Personal Mode (Get ready for lots of jumpscares: you won’t be able to hear the monsters until they’re right next to you)
  • Blackout (The lights on the map will turn off, meaning players will only have their flashlights to see)
  • Movement speeds
  • FOV

Customisation:

Unlock 35 different skins by leveling up or completing challenges.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

movies.name: Space Station and The Imposter Update

name: Horror Royale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual-core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 or AMD R7 250
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad-core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: Horror Royale is an online and local multiplayer co-op/PvP survival horror game. Communicate with your friends using proximity chat (but not so loud that the monsters can hear) and use items and your environment to avoid the monsters and survive.
